q_ch: 使用 Silk 的缝纫任务有哪些？
sql: SELECT st.* FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN sewing_material_allocation sma ON st.id = sma.sewing_task_id JOIN warehouse_material wm ON sma.warehouse_material_id = wm.id JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id WHERE m.name = 'Silk';
thought: To find which sewing tasks make use of the material named 'Silk', we need to join the sewing_material_allocation table with the warehouse_material table to get the material details, then join the materials table to filter by the material name 'Silk', and finally, we fetch the sewing task details.
